channel.title: Slicer on The blog of Heschlie
channel.description: Recent content in Slicer on The blog of Heschlie

item.title: Entering the 3D printing world (and a small rant about Simplify3d)
item.description: So I recently entered into the amazing world of 3D printing, my wife bought me an Ultimaker 2+ for my birthday this year! It has been a fascinating experience and a whole can of worms I never even knew existed. I will say, the Ultimaker series is supposed to be the most “plug it in and print” printer out there (or at least among the top in that group) but there was still quite a learning curve and there was a lot of tuning involved.
